// - SORT // Global Error messages (i.e. main include.php) - possibly rename global_error_message can't open activity.log // Common - add all shared words and phrases here - below is an example Scope //do i need this yet // Assets Templates Customer's Assets Display Name First Last // Billing Templates Invoice ID PayPal Transaction/receipt # Billing For Work Order ID # Date Invoice Due Date Amount: Workorder ID Balance Email: Phone: Transaction Log Trans Id Type Credit Card Cheque Direct Deposit Direct Deposit ID# Submit Direct Deposit Payment Paymate Paymate Transaction ID# Submit Paymate Payment Cash Gift Certificate Pay Pal Memo: Card Number Type CCV Expiration Document # Gift Code Enter the 16 digit code Redemption Code: Created: Expires: Cancel Redeem this on your next repair to save on parts and service. An email has been sent to the system // -- Menu / Navigation New Add New View Search Delete Close Closed Print Create New WO Print WO Home Unassigned Log Out Open Accounts Administration Business Setup MyIT CRM Info Customers Email Customer Customer Search Add New Customer Edit Customer New Gift Certificate Gift Certificate Delete Customer Work Orders Open Work Orders Closed Work Orders New Note Status Received Parts Order Parts Close Work Order ID View Employees New Employee Employees Invoice Invoice Only Paid Paid Invoices Unpaid Un-Paid Invoices Open Orders Closed Orders Schedule Invoices Welcome to your Online Office Company Notes Work Order Stats New Assigned Waiting For Parts Awaiting Payment Closed Unpaid Balance Partial Paid Total Out Paid In Full Received Monies Total Invoiced Total Total Invoice Stats Customer Stats New This Month New This Year You have // Customer Templates Customer Search Client Contact First Contact Last Primary Secondary Phone Type Email Action Customer Name Page of records found Work Mobile Contact // -- Customer View The Work Order Customer Details For Customer Contact Information Contact Address Primary Phone Work/Fax Phone Mobile Credit Terms City State Postcode Notes Type Website Residential Commercial Discount Created Last Activity Open Work Orders Closed Work Orders WO ID Date Opened Customer Scope Status Tech Action Work Order ID Gift Certificates ID Created Expire Amount Active Date Redemed Invoice Unpaid Invoices INV ID Date Paid Balance Date Paid Employee Paid Invoices Print HTML Print PDF View Delete Edit Customer Add New Customer Residential Commercial Charity Educational Governmental - - - - - Assets/Licenses Customer Assets ID Type Name Number/Serial Started Expiry Date Support Length Active Notes Get Directions Edit Customer Contact Help You can edit the customers details attached to the work order here. // Employee Templates Add New Employee Display Name NO special characters like !@#$%^*() First Name Last Name Password Confirm Phone Numbers Home Phone Number Work Phone Number Mobile Phone Number Address City State Postcode Employee Type Manager Supervisor Technician Email Address Submit Employee Search Employee Name View records found Display First Last Work Type Email Action View Employee Details Home Mobile Page Of Employee Details For Employee Contact Information Assigned Work Orders ID Edit Login Login ID WO ID Date Opened Customer Scope Status Action Work Order ID Position Employee works from Home Office // Expense Templates // -- Global Expense ID Payee Date Expense Type Advertising Bank Charges Broadband Credit Customer Full Refund Cutomer Partial Refund Equipment Gift Certificate Landline Mobile Phone Office Supplies Parts Fuel Postage Rates Rent Transport Utilities Voucher Wages Other Payment Method Bank Transfer Card Cash Cheque Credit Direct Debit Gift Certificate Google Checkout Paypal Voucher Other NET Amount TAX Rate TAX Amount Gross Amount REF Invoice Notes Item(s) Search For NO special characters like !@#$%^*() Search Reset Submit Update Submit, Then New Record // -- Navigation New Expense Search Expenses Expense Details Edit Expense Delete Expense // -- New Page New Expense Page New Expense Help This page is used to add a new Expense Record for your company.

When you have entered your data if you click on the Submit button the details will be sent to the database and then the details page of the New Expense Record will be shown for you to check.

However if you click on the Submit, Then New Record button the record will be sent to the database and this page reloaded ready for another entry. // -- Search page Expense Search Page Expense Search Help You can search by any category by using the dropdown box. Apart from Expense Type and Payment Method you can search by partial name.

The reset button will wipe your search so you can start again.
The arrows in the navigation section on the right are a simple method of changing pages, however you can also go directely to a specific page.

If you double click on a row the appropiate Expense Record Details Page will load.

The Notes and Item(s) are not directely displayed but if you hover over the Magnifying Glass they will then be displayed similiar to this Tooltip.

On the right of each Record Row there are icons for viewing, editing and deleting the record. Goto Page View Expense Details Edit Expense Details Delete Expense Record // -- Details Page Expense Details Page Edit details Expense Details Help This page allows you to view an Expense Record without having to edit it.

To edit this record you can click on the Edit Details next to this Tooltip or on the Edit link in the Main Nav Menu on the left. // -- Edit Page Expense Edit Page Expense Edit Help This page allows you to edit an Expense Record. Once you have made your changes, click on the Update Button and the changes will be submitted to the databse. // Validators Please enter the Payee The Payee name cannot be more than 80 characters Please enter the Date NET Amount cannot be more than 12 numbers TAX Rate cannot be more than 4 numbers TAX Amount cannot be more than 12 numbers Please enter the Gross Amount The Gross Amount cannot be more than 12 numbers Please enter the Item(s) or Service(s) purchased Please enter a page number Please enter a valid page number Invalid information entered. Please correct these fields. Are you Sure you want to delete this Expense Record ? This will permanently remove the record from the database. Record Deleted Record Not Deleted // General Ledger Menu General Ledger // Invoice Templates Paid Invoices Un-Paid Invoices Invoice For Work Order ID # Invoice Page Of Records Found. ID Date Due Customer WO Employee Tax Discount Amount Tech Date Paid Amount Paid Balance Cheques Bill Pay To Print HTML Print PDF Receive Payment Close Work Order Work Order must be closed before payment can be received. Labor No QTY Description Rate Total Parts Count Manufacturer Price Sub Total Shipping Tax Discount Transaction Log Trans Id Type Credit Card Cheque Cash Gift Certificate Pay Pal Memo Phone: Work: Mobile Add Remove Submit / Recalculate Close Invoice Work%20Order%20ID%20 Actions Labour Total Parts Total Upload a csv file into rates table CSV File example // -- New Page Delete Invoice New Invoice Help This page allows you to create invoices for your clients.

Whenever you change the date, add or remove an item you must press the Submit / Recalculate button to apply those changes before you print the invoice otherwise you will get an incorrect invoice and the changes will also not be applied to the database. // -- View Page View Invoice Help This page simply allows you to view and print paid invoice // -- Printable Invoice Templates Address Phone ABN Email Invoice ID Invoice Status Invoice Date Due Date Credit Terms Work Order Work Order Resolution Technician Bill To Invoice Invoice - Labour Items Parts Items Qty Labour Items Parts Items Unit Price Labour Total Parts Total Sub Total Shipping Discount Tax Invoice Total Paid Balance Payment Instructions We accept the following payment types Please call us to discuss payment options // -- Validators Delete Labour Record Delete Parts Record Are you Sure you want to delete this Labour Record ? This will permanently remove the record from the database. Are you Sure you want to delete this Parts Record ? This will permanently remove the record from the database. Record Deleted Record Not Deleted // Parts templates Order Parts Parts Order ID In order to use this features you must complete a free registration with In-Cite CRM and we must have a valid credit card on file in order to bill for the parts purchased from us. All parts are shipped via UPS and are shipped from one of our 11 Wharehouses across the country to your business location. You do not have to worry about keeping up a web site with inventory. All the parts you see listed here are feed by our application server. And with over 9000 parts in stock we should have what your are looking for. Each part purchased will seamlessly integrate into your Work Orders and invoicing go ahead and give it try. And you can view detailed reports of all purchases made. You can also adjust the price by adding markup to all products from the controll center. For more information please visit www.incitecrm.com. This service is only available to 48 continental States. We currently will not ship out side the US but this will change in the future. The small profit we make off parts purchased is what funds the Open Source Cite CRM and helps us to provide this free software. This feature is not required to use Cite CRM. You can always add your own parts at Invoice creation Time or add your own parts database. Once you click Check Out your order will be processed and your credit card on file will be charged the amount: You are using for your shipping method. Parts will be shipped from This can be changed in the Control Center. Our Parts Pricing are updated daily at 6:30 AM Pacific Time. Once you click Check Out do not refresh the page or click the back button. Please Print this invoice and keep it in a safe place. Thank you for your purchase. If you need assistance or RMA please contact 1-866-471-1343. You can always view your Invoice here. Your order will be processed and shipped within 24 hours. You chose UPS Ground so your package should arrive in 3 to 7 days and is being shipped from our Portland Warehouse. However if you click on the Submit, Then New Record button the record will be sent to the database and this page reloaded ready for another entry. // -- Search Page Refund Search Page Refund Search Help You can search by any category by using the dropdown box. Apart from Refund Type and Payment Method you can search by partial name.

The reset button will wipe your search so you can start again.
The arrows in the navigation section on the right are a simple method of changing pages, however you can also go directely to a specific page.

If you double click on a row the appropiate Refund Record Details Page will load.

The Notes and Item(s) are not directely displayed but if you hover over the Magnifying Glass they will then be displayed similiar to this Tooltip.

On the right of each Record Row there are icons for viewing, editing and deleting the record. To edit this record you can click on the Edit Details next to this Tooltip or on the Edit link in the Main Nav Menu on the left. // -- Edit Page Refund Edit Page Refund Edit Help This page allows you to edit an Refund Record. Once you have made your changes, click on the Update Button and the changes will be submitted to the databse. // -- Validators Please enter the Payee The Payee name cannot be more than 80 characters Please enter the Date NET Amount cannot be more than 12 numbers TAX Rate cannot be more than 4 numbers TAX Amount cannot be more than 12 numbers Please enter the Gross Amount The Gross Amount cannot be more than 12 numbers Please enter the Item(s) or Service(s) tha have been Refunded Please enter a page number Please enter a valid page number Invalid information entered. Please correct these fields. Are you Sure you want to delete this Refund Record ? This will permanently remove the record from the database. Once you have made your changes, click on the Update Button and the changes will be submitted to the databse. // Validators Please enter the suppliers name The Supplier s name cannot be more than 80 characters Please enter the contacts details Contact cannot be more than 80 characters Phone cannot be more than 20 numbers FAX cannot be more than 20 numbers Mobile cannot be more than 20 numbers Website not correct format Website cannot be more than 80 characters Email cannot be more than 80 characters Email not valid format City cannot be more than 20 numbers State cannot be more than 20 numbers Zip cannot be more than 13 numbers Please enter a description of this supplier Please enter a page number Please enter a valid page number Invalid information entered. Please correct these fields. Are you Sure you want to delete this Supplier Record ? This will permanently remove the record from the database. Record Deleted Record Not Deleted //// -- Workorder Module -- //// //// Common // General / Miscellaneous Work Order Work Order ID Print Work Order Print Work Order ID New for Page Of on Records Found Warning Employee Technician // Buttons Submit Update // WO Status Open Delete Pending Closed Created Assigned Waiting For Parts Waiting For Payment Payment Made Not Assigned Awaiting Parts Updated Closed By Status Unpaid // WO Messages There are No new Work Orders There are No Assigned Work Orders There are No Unpaid Work Orders There are No Work Orders Waiting for Parts No schedule has been set. Click the day on the calendar you wish to set the schedule. There are no closed work orders No Parts On Order // Table Headings ID Opened State Customer Scope Status Assigned To Last Change Tech Action Entered By Assign To // Invoicing / Shipping Invoice Discount Sub Total Shipping Total Tracking Get Tracking Qty // Scheduling Date Start End Schedule Today's Date Start Time End Time Schedule Notes // Customer Type Type Residential Commercial Charity Educational Governmental - - - - - // Customer Details Customer Details Email Credit Terms Website Address Phone Work Fax Primary Phone Mobile Home Notes Contact First Name Last Name Last Activity // Misc Tooltips Contact Info Print The Work Order View The Work Order //// Pages // Closed Closed Work Orders Closed Work Orders Help You can view all closed work orders here. // Details Work Order Details Work Order Details Help You can edit the Work order commments, notes, and set schedule by clicking the icon on the right of each window

You can navigate to the customer by clicking their name. Hover over the Magnifing glass by the customer name to view Quick Contact Information.

If you need to edit the Customers Contact Information click the Edit Icon by their contact details.

Click on the Employee name to go to the employees details. Hover over the Magnifing glass to view the employees Quick Contact Information.

Click the Print link on the Quick Bar to generate a printable PDF of this work order. Click the Close link on the Quick Bar to complete the order and start the invoicing processes. // Details - Customer Details Customer Details Click to edit customer details // Details - Edit Comments Comments Edit Comments Help You can edit the comments attached to the work order here. Edit Comments Click to edit comments // Details - Edit Description Description Edit Description Help You can edit the description attached to the work order here. Edit Description Click to edit description // Details - History History // Details - Notes Notes Add A New Note For Work Order ID Click to create a new note // Details - Parts Parts // Details - Schedule Schedule Create a New Schedule // New New Workorder New Workorder Help Create new Workorders here. // Open Open Workorders Open Workorders Help Double Click on an empty space in each row to go directly to the work order.

Hover over the magnifying glass under Customer to view the Quick Contact Information. Click on the Customers name to view the customers details.

Click on the status of each workorder listed to update the curent workorder status.

Hover over the Magnifying Glass under the Employee to view the Quick Contact Information for the assigned employee. Click on the employees name to view the details.

Under Action click the Printer Icon to print the workorder. Click the Magnifying Glass to view the workorder. Click the Red Stop sign to close the workorder and start the invoicing. // Print // Document Titles Technician Workorder Slip Customer Workorder Slip Job Sheet // Details Titles Customer Details Company Details // Workorder Details Workorder Details This note was created by There are no notes. // Summary Summary Service Times Schedule Departed Started WO Finished WO Returned No schedule has been set. Click the day on the calendar you want to set the schedule.N Signatures Client Name Signature // Equipment Receipt Equipment Receipt Below is a list of the equipment you have left with us. Please check and make sure the list is correct as it cannot be remedied later. Description Make/Model // Disclaimer Disclaimer We have a duty of care to preserve your computers data whilst we are servicing it, however it is the customers responsibilty to ensure that this data is reliably backed before work is started just incase data loss should occur. If you do not agree to these terms you cannot use our services. // Important Notes Important Notes
  • Please hold onto this receipt as proof of service request
  • This document (copies will not be accepted) MUST be produce this at time of pickup. If this can't be provided then photo identification is required.
// Footer This Workorder is confidential and contains privileged information. // Job Sheet Template Parts Used Required Passwords // Resolution Resolution Edit Resolution Help You can edit or close the resolution attached to the work order here. Edit Resolution Click to edit resolution Submit Changes Only Close Without Invoice Close With Invoice // Status Status Status Help You can change the status of a work order here. Update Work Order Status For Work Order ID New Status This Work order cannot be deleted.
If the work order is in the following state, created and open, you can delete it, otherwise you cannot. //// Error Messages (module code) // include.php Could not display the Work Order record requested The requested Work Order could not be found Could not display the Work Order(s) requested The requested Work Order(s) could not be found Could not display the Work Order(s) requested The requested Work Order(s) could not be found Failed to select and count closed Work Orders Could not display resolution for the Work Order Could not display Customer Information for the Work Order Could not display schedule for the Work Order Could not to display notes for the Work Order Could not display parts for the Work Order Could not display history for the Work Order Could not display Work Order status types Could not insert a note for the Work Order Could not insert a note for the Work Order Could not insert a history note for the Work Order Failed to get the Scope and Description for the Work Order Failed to get the Comments for the Work Order Failed to get the Resolution for the Work Order Failed to get the Employee Name by ID for the Work Order Failed to update the Scope and Description for the Work Order Failed to update the Comments for the Work Order Failed to update the Resolution for the Work Order Failed to update the Status for the Work Order Failed to update the Status to unassigned for the Work Order Failed to update the Last Activity Date for the Work Order Failed to Close the Work Order and create an Invoice Failed to get the Customer ID and create the Invoice Failed to Close the Work Order Failed to Delete the Work Order Failed to assign Work Order to another employee Failed build and return and Employee list Failed to check the Resolution Status of the Work Order // details.php There is no Work Order ID set There is no Work Order ID There is no Work Order ID // new.php Cannot create a New Work Order without a Customer ID -
